job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Full-stack
job.description: ltstronggtthe positionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtsenior software engineer fullstackltbrgtltbrgtlocations usa canada possibility of working remotelyltbrgtltbrgtat genentechroche we are way we could transform to become more agile better networked and better equipped to deal with the challenges and opportunities of an increasingly complex worldltbrgtltbrgtas a fullstack software engineer you will work on an agile team developing and maintaining python backends and javascript frontends you will work closely with other data and software engineers to build and maintain analytics dashboards and apps you will work closely with the data science team to build and maintain data science pipelines to succeed in this role you must have considerable experience writing productionready code in python and javascript you should be a selfstarter able to make progress without much directionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtkey responsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt develop and maintain frontend spas quasarvuejs ltligtltligt create data visualizations echartsapexchartsetc ltligtltligt develop and maintain restful json apis fastapi ltligtltligt develop and maintain scalable data pipelines ltligtltligt consume restful apis ltligtltligt understand and maintain data schemas and architectures ltligtltligt understand and architect etl processes ltligtltligt deploy data agile teams scrumkanban ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtqualifications skills ampamp knowledgeltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt at least years of relevant experience as a software engineer ltligtltligt python fastapi pandas preferred ltligtltligt javascript quasarvuejs css html ltligtltligt good knowledge of and experience with uiux best practices ltligtltligt gitgithub branches code reviews pull requests ltligtltligt rdbmsnosql mysql preferred ltligtltligt docker ltligtltligt plotlydash experience preferred ltligtltligt aws experience preferred lambdaglues ltligtltulgt ltstronggtwho we areltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtgenentech a member of the roche group and founder of the biotechnology industry is dedicated to pursuing groundbreaking science to discover and develop medicines for people with serious and lifethreatening diseases to solve the worlds most complex health challenges we ask bigger questions that challenge our industry and the boundaries of science to transform society our transformational discoveries include the first targeted antibody for cancer and the first medicine for primary progressive multiple sclerosisltbrgtltbrgtdiversity and inclusion dampampi are critical to the success of our company and our impact on society we believe that by championing diversity of background thought and experience we can foster a sense of belonging and provide an environment where every employee feels valued included and able to contribute their best for the patients we serve were focused on attracting retaining developing and advancing our people to their full potential by rewarding bold ways of thinking and integrating inclusive behaviors into every aspect of our workltbrgtltbrgtthe next step is yours to apply today click on the apply for
